description: Revlon ColorSilk Buttercream is a rich, caring hair color cream that delivers supreme lasting color, ultimate shine and softness. This revolutionary ammonia-free formula is enriched with our Triple Butter Complex, a combination of three of nature’s most decadent butters: Mango, Shea and Coconut, plus Argan Oil to help hydrate and condition your hair. The post treatment nourishing mask contains a four-oil blend – Argan, Avocado, Sunflower and Olive –for conditioning hair two weeks post coloring. The kit also includes a unique 3-in-1 brush, which allows for a more precise application. Available in 24 luscious shades. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.

criteria: See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care

description:
Experience perfection with the Clairol Nice ‘n Easy Perfect 10 Permanent Black Hair Dye Kit. This complete kit comes with high gloss color cream, color blend activator, color seal conditioner, and expert gloves, making it nice ‘n easy to give your hair the color boost of your dreams. All you need is ten quick minutes to get luscious color and gloss with the perfect balance of lightness, darkness, and tone. This black hair dye is gentle on your hair and scalp, and best of all, it provides natural-looking coverage for up to 60 head-turning days.
				    	
					/nIt's the most-awarded hair color by beauty editors.* Perfect 10 is hair color so incredibly quick, gorgeously glossy and technologically advanced. And it's earning accolades for beauty and science alike./nChoose a hue that's within two shades of your natural hair color. Perfect 1O by Nice 'n Easy offers a palette of 10 beautiful blonde shades, making it simple to find the shade that's right for you./nAsh blonde is characterized by cooler beige tones. Warmer tones, such as rich honey or butter, create a perfectly golden-blonde look./nIf you're fair, with blue or green eyes, complementary red shades abound. Cool copper, or even brighter, more vibrant tones, will suit your complexion. If you have dark or olive skin, opt for a darker auburn, or perhaps a chestnut color. Strawberry blonde looks best with a medium, warm complexion./nBrassy hair is the number one complaint among my clients. Banish brassiness by weaving cooler beige or ash-tinted tones throughout your mane./nClairol Perfect 1O offers 100% gray coverage, so your gray hairs stay under wraps. If stubborn gray hairs persist, leave the color on for an extra five minutes./nNot everyone can get their hair colored at a salon. For those of you who do, Perfect 1O by Nice 'n Easy extends the time between salon visits and gives your color an infusion of gloss and shine./n An exclusive advanced color crème formula with micropearls delivers color in less time* and with less damage. And it gives you high gloss hair color with flawless gray coverage./nThis breakthrough technology is the biggest advance in hair color in 50 years—it has 18 patents applied for and received the Royal Society of Chemistry Teamwork in Innovation Award. And it created the one and only Perfect 10./n Clairol research and development expert Frauke Neuser answers some frequently asked questions:/nPerfect 10 is the first product to use Clairol's breakthrough formula, which works so efficiently that it does the job in just 10 minutes. The advanced color crème with micropearls allows for fast penetration into the hair fibers. Once inside the hair, the unique combination of effective ingredients targets the natural melanin pigment and deposit the new color without reacting as much with the surrounding hair protein. The complete coloring process is accelerated and we can achieve high gloss color and 100% gray coverage in 10 minutes./nMicropearls are the color molecules that exist within Perfect 10's advanced color crème formula. Each shade of Perfect 10 contains a unique mix of different colored molecules and conditioning ingredients to create the desired shade. Perfect 10's advanced color crème with micropearls is what provides consumers with high gloss color in just 10 minutes./nPerfect 10's formula is totally different from anything else out there. It's not just about one ingredient—it is the combination of new elements that makes it so exciting. It uses a unique lightening system—which is the heart of any colorant—to prepare the hair and speed up the color reaction, energizing color to move inside the hair, creating beautiful, high gloss color in just 10 minutes. It works at a pH closer to that of hair itself, making it gentler and better protecting* the hair surface. It is this total package that makes Perfect 10 the first big color breakthrough in over 50 years./nAbsolutely not! Interestingly, when we developed Perfect 10 our first objective was to create a 'better' hair colorant—and along the way we realized the new technology was so good that it could do the job in just 10 minutes. Most other 10-minute products use existing, conventional technology—just changed a bit to give faster results. This is very different from the approach we took with Perfect 10./nPerfect 10 is less damaging* to the hair surface because of its unique advance color crème formula. Its active ingredients work best at a lower, gentler pH than most colorants, so Perfect 10 better preserves hair's natural protective coating called the f-layer. In addition, we have shown that the advanced color crème reacts more selectively with the pigments inside the hair than with the hair itself, causing less surface damage.* On top of that, the ingredient glycine, which is an essential amino acid and one of the fundamental building blocks of hair, works as an antioxidant, reducing the effect of free radicals/damage molecules (for CA) formed during coloring. And last but not least, Perfect 10's weekly ColorSeal treatment helps protect hair, keeping it smooth and soft./nThe development of the PerfectColor Comb was based on feedback from our consumers who struggled with the traditional color applicators. It is designed to envelop each strand of hair in the rich color crème from root to tip for even color results and flawless gray coverage. The comb has 14 outlets to provide optimum color distribution—five at the tip of each nozzle, five halfway down each nozzle and four at the bottom between the nozzles. This ensures even coverage regardless of the length or thickness of the user's hair./nPerfect 10 owes its great scent to our formulators and fragrance artists. The formulators invented a highly efficient color technology which works at a lower pH and therefore contains less free ammonia than other products. Ammonia is the ingredient responsible for the harsh smell of many colorants. In addition, our fragrance artists created a scent which not only masks the remaining colorant odor but is also based on the same principles as a fine fragrance product and has beautiful top, body and base notes./nA lot of work has gone into making sure that each shade of Perfect 10 matches the color results shown on the box. First, the shades were tested repeatedly in our salons on consumers to confirm just the right color results. Then, hundreds of natural hair samples of appropriate starting colors were treated with Perfect 10 in our color development labs and analyzed. The technical color readings were then translated into on-pack images. Latest imaging and software programs have turned this work into a truly high-tech process because we know how important it is for our consumers to get exactly the hair color they want expect./nPerfect 10 gives shiny, glossy hair in several ways. First, it deposits high-intensity color deep inside the hair fiber, leading to more intense light interactions—visible as shine. Second, it works at a lower, gentler pH with an antioxidant, reducing the effect of free radicals formed during coloring and better protecting the hair surface. A smooth, intact surface is shinier than a rough, broken one. Third, Perfect 10 uses a dual conditioning system with the color crème and the weekly ColorSeal treatment, allowing the hair fibers to be more aligned and reflect light better./nPerfect 10 is the only product in the market that uses our patented AminoGlycine technology—so it is totally unique. The huge number of 18 filed patents shows the level of innovation that went into this product. Some patents cover the effective ingredients that form the color in just 10 minutes. Other patents refer to the low, more gentle pH or the addition of glycine as an antioxidant. Yet other patents describe our unique PerfectColor Comb and the advanced color crème. So 18 patents really means we've put a lot of research, science and innovation into Perfect 10, to make it a truly unique hair color product./n Remove mixing cap, squeeze tube (1) into bottle (2)./n Replace mixing cap securely and hold away from face. Do not shake with comb attached./n Shake thoroughly for a minimum of 20 seconds until fully mixed. Remove mixing cap immediately./n PerfectColor Comb for All Over ColorIdeal for first time users or if you haven't colored for more than 3 months. /n /n Applicator Tip for Root ApplicationIdeal if you color every 4-6 weeks. Use the applicator tip for your roots if your root line is 1/2 inch or less. /n /nApply with the PerfectColor Comb starting at your roots and where you have the most gray./nTurn bottle upside down & gently squeeze as you glide the PerfectColor Comb downward through hair./nPart & lift hair into sections as you apply color. Check hair is completely saturated & work through if necessary. Do not rub into scalp./nLeave color on for just 10 minutes (or time indicated by your strand test)./nPart your hair into sections with the applicator tip. Apply mixture to your roots. Leave on roots for 5 minutes./n Replace applicator tip with PerfectColor Comb to apply remaining color to rest of hair.Turn bottle upside down & gently squeeze as you glide the PerfectColor Comb downward through hair./nPart hair into sections and apply color to completely saturate hair. Check hair is completely saturated & work through if necessary. Do not rub into scalp./nLeave color on for an additional 5 minutes (or time indicated by your strand test)./nRinse until water runs clear. Gently massage an amount the size of a quarter of the ColorSeal Intensive Conditioning Cr�me through hair. Leave on for 2 minutes then rinse./nSave remaining conditioner to use once a week for up to 6 weeks of optimal high gloss color, shine and softness.

description: Living is all about trying new experiences and feeling your best. So why waste time on bland, flat hair color? That's why Clairol Nice 'n Easy permanent hair color gives you 8 weeks of true-to-you color with three salon tones for a blend of highlights and lowlights. Expertly designed to work with your unique hair, Nice 'n Easy offers salon-quality permanent hair color without the cost. Keep your color looking vibrant with Clairol CC+ ColorSeal Conditioner, which locks in softness and shine. To cover grays between colorings, try Nice 'n Easy Root Touch-Up to blend seamlessly with your color. For natural-looking color that's as real as you are, trust Clairol Nice 'n Easy hair color.

description:
Since 1973, L’Oreal Superior Preference has been our gold standard in permanent hair color – delivering extraordinary shine and luminous hair color that lasts and lasts. What makes Superior Preference hair color so special is our unique Fade-Defying Color and Shine System that pairs our translucent gel formula with our famous Care Supreme Conditioning treatment. The end result is beautifully crafted, long lasting hair color with depth and dimension. Available in over 50 luminous shades so you can find your own signature color.
				    	
					/nBy L'Oreal Paris

criteria: See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care

description: Express yourself with /n from /n! With these temporary hair colors anyone can switch up their look as much as they want to! This long-lasting formula is vegan friendly and cruelty free. Along with that, this formula doesn’t contain harsh chemicals like ammonia and peroxide. Don’t commit to one color, with 14 bold shades designed for light blonde or bleached hair you can switch up your look as often as you want to./n Semi-Permanent Color Washes Out/n Long Wear – Lasts 7-15 Shampoos/n 70ml e 2.36 US Fl.oz/n Vegan and Cruelty Free/n Moisturizing and Non-Damaging Formula/n No Harsh Chemicals like Peroxide and Ammonia/n Highly Pigmented Colors/n If you’re looking to achieve bold hair looks without damaging your hair look no further. Unlike permanent hair dyes this cream formula is non-damaging. Not only does it add vivid color to your hair it also moisturizes it too./n Artic Blue/n Butter Blonde/n Chocolate Brown/n Emerald Green/n Golden Blonde/n Natural Black/n Orange Dream/n Pink Power/n Purple Rain/n Red Velvet/n Silver Fox/n Violet Wonder/n Wine Red/n Yellow Rose/nWorks best on very light hair. If your hair is dark blonde or darker it is recommended that you pre-lighten hair to a light, pale blonde by bleaching. The lighter the hair, the better the result!/nHair must be freshly shampooed and thoroughly dried and not conditioned. Wear gloves when applying color and apply it evenly. You should comb it through while avoiding the scalp and direct skin contact. Leave it in hair for 20 minutes or longer depending on how intense you want the color. Thoroughly shampoo and rinse hair with lukewarm water until it runs clear. Now be bold, be beautiful and be you!

description: /n 1: First clean your hair and dry. but make sure keep a little wet, about 80 percent dry, it will make coloring & styling more easy./n 2: Take a right amount of wax from the bottle onto the palm of your hand. Use your fingers to apply product at the scalp, pulling hairs together. Repeat several times in order to style to desired effect./n 3: Apply to a section of hair for highlights or apply the wax on the entire head./n 4: Washes out easily with just warm water./n /n Dark hair is not easy to color, it needs more./n Starts fairly wet and goes matte and sets quick./n It is a styling product, so the hair will harden./n When intense sweating occurs, it can cause color loss./n /n For boys' shot hair, one box can use 3 times normally./n For girls' shot hair, one box can use 2 times normally./n For girls' mid-length hair, one box can use only 1 times./n For long hair, please buy at least 2 boxes for one time using./n /n If our hair color wax don't work for you or you simply don't like them we will give you a full refund no questions asked! This is our policy, so you can buy from us with confidence knowing we've got you covered!

description: Garnier Olia is unlike any other traditional, permanent hair color. Powered by a 60% oil blend formula with natural flower oils, Olia propels colorants deep into the hair, giving you vivid color results and 100% gray coverage. The oils help to reverse roughness and dullness without hair feeling weighed down. The non-drip formula has no ammonia, so it smells great as you apply. The end result? More brilliant, long-lasting color and hair that is hydrated, silky, looks full and up to 3x shinier than uncolored, unwashed hair. What's in the hair dye kit? A developer applicator, a colorant tube, after color conditioner, as well as a set of gloves and the instruction sheet. Packaging May Vary

description: Experience Garnier Nutrisse Ultra Coverage Nourishing Color Creme, the hair color that not only gives you rich, radiant color for silkier, shinier hair but is the first at-home hair color with Cover Plus Technology specifically formulated for 100% grey coverage on hard-to-cover, ultra-resistant grays. criteria: See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care

description: NATURCOLOR is an herbal-based high-quality permanent hair color gel designed to change or enhance one’s existing hair color. It was formulated for those who are ecologically minded and may be coloring their hair for the first time. Naturcolor is not for women only. Men can discreetly color their hair with it at home, and it’s great for beards and mustaches. Naturcolor pigments color with a subtle transparent effect. Your gray hair will take the color differently than the darker portions of hair allowing for subtle color on color tones that look natural and never appear “dyed”. It can be used to add subtle, but radiant highlights, or to dramatically change your existing hair color. It will not fade as other hair color products do. NATURCOLOR was designed for chemically sensitive people and every effort has been made to substitute safe, natural ingredients for the harsh often dangerous chemicals that pervade the hair-care industry. Naturcolor comes in 31 colors classified as: Natural (N), Ash (C), Mahogany (M), Copper (R) and Golden (D). * and a complete application takes less than an hour *Naturcolor recommends a skin sensitivity test. NATURCOLOR provides a Consumer Care Hotline available 8am to 5pm Monday through Thursday, 8am to 3:30pm Fridays, PST. Our support staff can answer all your questions concerning color selection and application. Please feel free to call us at 800-784-8212.

description: L'Oreal Superior Preference Hair Color - our gold standard in luxurious permanent hair color since 1973. Superior Preference at-home hair coloring kit is special because it delivers super shiny luminous hair color. Preference gives you long lasting hair color that's fade-defying for weeks and weeks. From root to tip whether you have blonde hair, brown hair, black hair or red hair color, your color won't look dull or brassy. We pair our translucent gel hair dye formula with our exclusive Care Supreme Conditioner with Shine Serum that help keep color vibrancy and provides silky and shiny hair. Preference is available in over 50 Luminous Shades. Our Luminous Blonde shades range across a wide spectrum from light blonde to dirty blonde, honey blonde to red blonde and strawberry blonde to champagne blonde. Our rich Brown shades range across the spectrum of ash brown to sun-kissed caramel brown. Our deep Red shades range from dark red to auburn and copper to mahogany to burgundy. Each shade is crafted to show infinite tones and reflects, so you can find your own Superior Preference signature. Packaging may vary, what you receive may not be what is reflected on site.

description: Garnier Nutrisse Ultra Color Nourishing Hair Color Creme dramatically transforms naturally dark hair with ultra reflective tones. Choose from Ultra Light Blondes, Ultra Intense Reds and Burgundies, Ultra Lightening Browns, and Ultra Reflective Blacks. Ultra Light Blondes take dark brunettes to blonde without bleach, Ultra Intense Reds and Ultra Intense Burgundies offer vibrant red tones for darker hair, Ultra Lightening Browns lift dark hair up to three shades lighter without the brassiness, and Ultra Reflective Blacks transform even the darkest hair with visibly reflective, shiny tones. Garnier Nutrisse Ultra Color Nourishing Hair Color Creme comes with an ampoule of grapeseed oil to start nourishing hair while you color because nourished hair means better color. The non-drip hair color formula spreads easily and the after-color conditioner is infused with 3 fruit oils--avocado, olive and shea--for silkier, shinier, more nourished hair. description: Garnier Olia Hair Color is an ammonia free hair color that uses an exclusive 60% oil blend with natural flower oils to achieve brilliant, radiant color results. The unique non-drip velvet cream formula propels colorants into the hair--without ammonia--with a pleasant sensorial fragrance. Garnier Olia Hair Color visibly improves and restores hair as the oils help to reverse roughness and dullness for more brilliant, long-lasting color. Hair is hydrated, silky, 3x shinier and visibly healthier (than uncolored, unwashed hair) . Hair Color Kit contains easy applicator bottle with developer, colorant tube, after color conditioner, gloves and instructional insert.

criteria: See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care

description:
Garnier Nutrisse is the only permanent hair color creme that nourishes while you color with avocado, olive, and shea oils. The nourishing color creme enriched with fruit oil concentrate, penetrates deep into hair fibers to nourish and condition your hair so it takes color better and holds it longer, root-to-tip. Garnier Nutrisse delivers rich, radiant, long-lasting hair color with 100% grey coverage. • Permanent, nourishing hair color creme with three fruit oils- avocado, olive, and shea • The only hair color creme with a separate ampoule of grape seed oil to start nourishing as you color • Rich, radiant, long-lasting color with 100 percent grey coverage • Available in 45 Nourishing Shades Always read the hair color instructions insert in the box. Store between 50° and 80° F. Questions? Garnier Nutrisse has expert color consultants to help you. Call: 1-800-4GARNIER (1-800-442-7643). IMPORTANT: Hair color can cause an allergic reaction. Do not use if you’ve already had a reaction to a hair color product or if scalp is sensitive, itchy or damaged. Tattoos may increase risk of an allergic reaction. Do skin allergy test 48 hours before each use of this product. Don’t use over compound henna or progressive color. Wait at least 14 days after bleach, relaxing or perm before use. Don’t use on children. This is a safety summary. Read all labeling and instructions completely.
				    	
					/nBy Garnier Nutrisse
